# baseCurve

**Instance Property**

Part of the contact’s fit, it measures the curve of the back side of the contact, measured in mm.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var baseCurve: HKQuantity? { get }
```

## Discussion

The property’s range is 7.8 to 9.2 mm.

## Accessing the specification’s data

- **diameter**: Part of the contact’s fit, it measures the diameter of the lens, measured in mm.
